awards.text: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win.

fullplot: This made-for-television adaptation doesn't waste time with preliminaries. Within 15 minutes of its opening, Dr. Henry Jekyll has already experimented on himself with a concoction that he'd hoped would neutralize his baser instincts but which releases without inhibition his long-repressed animal inclinations.

title: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
